snippet: Britain said it would introduce measures at airports and rail terminals to screen passengers from affected countries as concerns over Ebola grew in Europe.
abstract: Britain says it will introduce measures at airports and rail terminals to screen passengers from affected countries as concerns over Ebola grow in Europe.

byline.contributor: Raphael Minder contributed reporting from Madrid, and Nicola Clark from Paris.

lead_paragraph: Britain said it would introduce measures at airports and rail terminals to screen passengers from affected countries as concerns over Ebola grew in Europe.

headline.main: Britain to Screen for Ebola Amid Possible New Cases in Europe
headline.print_headline: Britain to Screen for Ebola Amid Possible New Cases in Europe
